dialogue.text: Hmm, what to do? Oh, hey there Fiona!
Hi, Jane! What are you thinking about
Don't tell anyone but I accidently broke my friend, Sylvia's, fishing rod.
Sounds rough, well I'll leave you to it then.
Wait, I just had a brilliant idea! How about you craft a simple rod for me and in exchange I'll give you some gelplant seeds?
